Row.Text: Expedition Base
Aerodrome

+8[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production. Modern Military Building. Required to train Air Units. Air Units trained in this City will spawn at this Building's location. Packed Air Units have +1 Intercept Range. Must be placed on Flat Terrain. Occupies a full tile and cannot be paired with another Building.

Modern Military Building. Required to train Air Units. Air Units trained in this City will spawn at this Building's location. Packed Air Units have +1 Intercept Range. Must be placed on Flat Terrain. Occupies a full tile and cannot be paired with another Building.
When built for the first time, grants a free Squadron Commander.
Cannery
+5[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food. +10% Growth Rate. Modern Food Building.
+10% Growth Rate. Modern Food Building.
City Park
+4[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness. +1[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness on Vegetation. Modern Happiness Building.
+1[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness on Vegetation. Modern Happiness Building.
Defensive Fortifications

Adds 100 HP to the District and +15 Combat Strength to Units defending in the tile. All Fortified Districts must be conquered to capture a Settlement. Modern Fortification. Must be built adjacent to another Fortified District. Can be purchased in Towns only on the Town Center.

Adds 100 HP to the District and +15 Combat Strength to Units defending in the tile. All Fortified Districts must be conquered to capture a Settlement. Modern Fortification. Must be built adjacent to another Fortified District. Can be purchased in Towns only on the Town Center.
Department Store
+5[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness. Increases the number of Resources that may be assigned to this Settlement by 1. Modern Happiness Building.
Increases the number of Resources that may be assigned to this Settlement by 1. Modern Happiness Building.
Factory

+6[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production. Allows one type of Factory Resource to be slotted in this Settlement. Increases the number of Resources that may be assigned to this Settlement by 1. Modern Resource Building. Must be built in a Settlement connected to the Capital by Railroad.

Allows one type of Factory Resource to be slotted in this Settlement. Increases the number of Resources that may be assigned to this Settlement by 1. Modern Resource Building. Must be built in a Settlement connected to the Capital by Railroad.
Grocer
+4[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food. +1[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food on Camps, Farms, Fishing Boats, Pastures, and Plantations. Warehouse Food Building. Ageless. Buildable in all Ages. Can be purchased in Towns.
+1[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food on Camps, Farms, Fishing Boats, Pastures, and Plantations. Warehouse Food Building. Ageless. Buildable in all Ages. Can be purchased in Towns.
Ironworks

+4[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production. +1[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production on Mines, Quarries, Woodcutters, Clay Pits, Oil Rigs, and Mountain Terrain. Warehouse Production Building. Ageless. Buildable in all Ages. Can be purchased in Towns.

+1[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production on Mines, Quarries, Woodcutters, Clay Pits, Oil Rigs, and Mountain Terrain. Warehouse Production Building. Ageless. Buildable in all Ages. Can be purchased in Towns.
Laboratory
+6[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science. +1[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science on Quarters. Modern Science Building.
+1[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science on Quarters. Modern Science Building.
Launch Pad
+8[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science. Unlocks the Launch Satellite Project. Modern Science Building. Must be placed on Flat Terrain. Occupies a full tile and cannot be paired with another Building.
Unlocks the Launch Satellite Project. Modern Science Building. Must be placed on Flat Terrain. Occupies a full tile and cannot be paired with another Building.
Military Academy
Grants a free Level to new Commanders trained in this City.
Military Units trained in this City will spawn at this Building's location. Modern Military Building.
Modern Bridge

+6[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold. Allows Land Units to move over a Navigable River without having to Embark. Cheaper to build where a Road has already formed a Ferry across the River. Must be placed on a Navigable River. Unaffected by Floods. Can be purchased in Towns.

Allows Land Units to move over a Navigable River without having to Embark. Cheaper to build where a Road has already formed a Ferry across the River. Must be placed on a Navigable River. Unaffected by Floods. Can be purchased in Towns.
Museum
+5[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture. Has 3 Artifact slots. Modern Culture Building.
Has 3 Artifact slots. Modern Culture Building.
Opera House
+6[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture. +3[icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence. Modern Culture and Diplomacy Building.
+3[icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence. Modern Culture and Diplomacy Building.
Port

+5[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold. Increases number of Resources that may be assigned to City by 2. Modern Gold Building. Naval Units trained in this City will spawn at this Building's location. Must be placed on Coast adjacent to land.

Increases number of Resources that may be assigned to City by 2. Modern Gold Building. Naval Units trained in this City will spawn at this Building's location. Must be placed on Coast adjacent to land.
Radio Station
+6[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness and +4[icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence. Modern Diplomacy and Happiness Building.
Modern Diplomacy and Happiness Building.
Rail Station

+8[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold. +10%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards training Units in Cities with a Railroad. When built, upgrades any Roads to Settlements that also have a Rail Station into Railroads. Railroads allow Units to move from one Settlement with a Rail Station to another. Modern Gold Building. Occupies a full tile and cannot be paired with another Building. Can be purchased in Towns.

When built, upgrades any Roads to Settlements that also have a Rail Station into Railroads. Railroads allow Units to move from one Settlement with a Rail Station to another. Modern Gold Building. Occupies a full tile and cannot be paired with another Building. Can be purchased in Towns.
+10%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards training Units in Cities with a Railroad.
Schoolhouse
+5[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science. Modern Science Building.
Modern Science Building.
Stock Exchange
+6[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold. +1[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold on Quarters. Modern Gold Building.
+1[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold on Quarters. Modern Gold Building.
Tenement
+6[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food. +1[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness on Quarters. Modern Food Building.
+1[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness on Quarters. Modern Food Building.
Railyard
+5[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production. +1[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production Adjacency for Quarters and Wonders. American Unique Production Building. Ageless.
American Unique Production Building. Ageless.
Steel Mill
+6[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production. +1[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold Adjacency for Resources and Wonders. American Unique Production Building. Ageless.
American Unique Production Building. Ageless.
Ginkō
+5[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold. +1[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold Adjacency for Gold Buildings and Wonders. Meiji Japan Unique Gold Building. Ageless.
Meiji Unique Gold Building. Ageless.
Jukogyo
+5[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production. +1[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production Adjacency for Coastal Terrain and Wonders. Meiji Japan Unique Production Building. Ageless.
Meiji Unique Production Building. Ageless.
Jardin à la Française
+5[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture. +1[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness Adjacency for Culture Buildings and Wonders. French Empire Unique Culture Building. Ageless.
French Empire Unique Culture Building. Ageless.
Salon
+5[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness. +1[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture Adjacency for Happiness Buildings and Wonders. French Empire Unique Happiness Building. Ageless.
French Empire Unique Happiness Building. Ageless.
Catedral
+5[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture. +1[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness Adjacency for Culture Buildings and Wonders. Mexican Unique Culture Building. Ageless.
Mexican Unique Culture Building. Ageless.
Portal de Mercaderes
+5[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture. +1[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold Adjacency for Gold Buildings and Wonders. Mexican Unique Culture Building. Ageless.
Mexican Unique Culture Building. Ageless.
Shiguan
+6[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science. +1[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness Adjacency for Happiness Buildings and Wonders. Qing Unique Science Building. Ageless.
Qing Unique Science Building. Ageless.
Qianzhuang
+5[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold. +1[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold Adjacency for Gold Buildings and Wonders. Qing Unique Gold Building. Ageless.
Qing Unique Gold Building. Ageless.
Bang

+3[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] and[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness. Siamese Unique Improvement. Ageless. Does not remove Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing Improvement on a Navigable River.
Siamese Unique Improvement. Ageless. Does not remove Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing Improvement on a Navigable River.
Kabaka's Lake

+3[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness. Receives Lake yield bonuses, including yields for all Buganda's abilities and the Muzibu Azaala Mpanga Wonder. Bugandan Unique Improvement. Ageless. Does not remove Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing Improvement on Flat Terrain. One per Settlement.

Receives Lake yield bonuses, including yields for all Buganda's abilities and the Muzibu Azaala Mpanga Wonder. Bugandan Unique Improvement. Ageless. Does not remove Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing Improvement on Flat Terrain. One per Settlement.
Obshchina

+2[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food on all Farms in this Settlement. +2[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture in Tundra. Russian Empire Unique Improvement. Ageless. Does not remove Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing Improvement, and cannot be placed adjacent to another Obshchina.

+2[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food on all Farms in this Settlement. +2[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture in Tundra. Russian Empire Unique Improvement. Ageless. Does not remove Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing Improvement, and cannot be placed adjacent to another Obshchina.
Stepwell

+2[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food from adjacent Farms. Mughal Unique Improvement. Ageless. Does not remove Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing Improvement on Flat Terrain. Cannot be placed adjacent to another Stepwell.
Mughal Unique Improvement. Ageless. Does not remove Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing Improvement on Flat Terrain. Cannot be placed adjacent to another Stepwell.
Shore Battery

+5[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production. +3 Ranged Combat Strength, +1 range to Ranged and Siege Units in this tile. +5 HP healing per turn to Military Units in this tile. City-State Unique Improvement. Does not remove Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing Improvement adjacent to Coast.

+3 Ranged Combat Strength, +1 range to Ranged and Siege Units in this tile. +5 HP healing per turn to Military Units in this tile. City-State Unique Improvement. Does not remove Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing Improvement adjacent to Coast.
Open-Air Museum

+5[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture. +2[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science for each adjacent Tropical tile, +2[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture for each adjacent Tundra tile, and +2[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold for each adjacent Desert tile. City-State Unique Improvement. Does not remove Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing Improvement. One Per Settlement.
City-State Unique Improvement. Does not remove Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing Improvement. One Per Settlement.
Entrepôt

+5[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold. +1[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold on every Navigable River tile in this Settlement. City-State Unique Improvement. Does not remove Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing Improvement on a Navigable River not adjacent to another Entrepôt.

+1[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold on every Navigable River tile in this Settlement. City-State Unique Improvement. Does not remove Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing Improvement on a Navigable River not adjacent to another Entrepôt.
Institute

+5[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science. +2[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science on adjacent Wet or Vegetated Terrain. City-State Unique Improvement. Does not remove Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing Improvement, and cannot be Adjacent to another Institute.

+2[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science on adjacent Wet or Vegetated Terrain. City-State Unique Improvement. Does not remove Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing Improvement, and cannot be adjacent to another Institute.
Industrial Park

American Unique Quarter. Created by constructing the Railyard and Steel Mill in the same District. Increases the number of [icon:NOTIFICATION_DISCOVER_RESOURCE] Resources that may be assigned to this Settlement by 2.
Increases the number of [icon:NOTIFICATION_DISCOVER_RESOURCE] Resources that may be assigned to this Settlement by 2.
Avenue
French Imperial Unique Quarter. Created by constructing the Jardin à la Française and Salon in the same District. +2[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness on Quarters in this City.
+2[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness on Quarters in this City.
Zaibatsu

Meiji Unique Quarter. Created by constructing the Ginkō and Jukogyo in the same District. +1[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold and[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production on Buildings in adjacent Districts. Increases the number of [icon:NOTIFICATION_DISCOVER_RESOURCE] Resources that may be assigned to this Settlement by 1.
+1[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold and[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production on Buildings in adjacent Districts.
Huiguan
Qing Unique Quarter. Created by constructing the Qianzhuang and Shiguan in the same District. +25%[icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence in this Settlement.
+25%[icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence in this Settlement.
Zócalo
Mexican Unique Quarter. Created by constructing the Catedral and Portal de Mercaderes in the same District. +2[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture for every Tradition slotted into the Government.
+2[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture for every Tradition slotted into the Government.
Brandenburg Gate

+6[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production. This Settlement suffers no[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness penalties from War Weariness. +5[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness in conquered Settlements. Ageless. Must be placed adjacent to a District.
This Settlement suffers no[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness penalties from War Weariness. +5[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness in conquered Settlements. Ageless. Must be placed adjacent to a District.
Chengde Mountain Resort
+6[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold. +5%[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture for every other Civilization with which you have a Trade Route. Ageless. Must be placed adjacent to a Mountain.
+5%[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture for every other Civilization with which you have a Trade Route. Ageless. Must be placed adjacent to a Mountain.
Dogo Onsen
+4[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness. This Settlement gains a Population every time you enter a Celebration. Ageless. Must be placed adjacent to Coast.
This Settlement gains a Population every time you enter a Celebration. Ageless. Must be placed adjacent to Coast.
Doi Suthep
+4[icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence. +5[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture and[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold for every City-State you are Suzerain of. Ageless. Must be placed on Rough Terrain.
+5[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture and[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold for every City-State you are Suzerain of. Ageless. Must be placed on Rough Terrain.
Eiffel Tower
+5[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture. +2[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture and[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness on Quarters in this City. Ageless. Must be placed adjacent to a District.
+2[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture and[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness on Quarters in this City. Ageless. Must be placed adjacent to a District.
Hermitage
+4[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture. +10%[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture in Cities that have a Great Work on display. Has 3 Artifact slots. Ageless. Must be placed on Tundra.
+10%[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture in Cities that have a Great Work on display. Has 3 Artifact slots. Ageless. Must be placed on Tundra.
Muzibu Azaala Mpanga

+4[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food. +2[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food on all Lake tiles. +2[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture and[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness on Lake tiles in this Settlement. Ageless. Must be placed adjacent to a Lake.
+2[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food on all Lake tiles. +2[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture and[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness on Lake tiles in this Settlement. Ageless. Must be placed adjacent to a Lake.
Oxford University
+4[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science. Grants 2 free Technologies. +1 Wildcard Attribute Point. Ageless. Must be placed adjacent to a District.
Grants 2 free Technologies. +1 Wildcard Attribute point. Ageless. Must be placed adjacent to a District.
Palacio de Bellas Artes

+5[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture. +2[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness on Great Works. +10%[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness in this City. Has 3 Artifact slots. Ageless. Must be placed adjacent to a District.
+2[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness on Great Works. +10%[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness in this City. Has 3 Artifact slots. Ageless. Must be placed adjacent to a District.
Red Fort
+4[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold. Acts as a Fortified District that must be conquered. +50 HP to this tile and all City Centers. Ageless. Must be adjacent to a District.
Acts as a Fortified District that must be conquered. +50 HP to this tile and all City Centers. Ageless. Must be adjacent to a District.
Statue of Liberty
+6[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness. Spawns 4 Migrants. Ageless. Must be placed on Coast adjacent to land.
Spawns 4 Migrants. Ageless. Must be placed on Coast adjacent to land.
Taj Mahal
+5[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold. +50% Celebration duration. +1 Wildcard Attribute Point. Ageless. Must be placed on Plains.
+50% Celebration duration. +1 Wildcard Attribute Point. Ageless. Must be placed on Plains.
Manhattan Project
+5[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science. Grants player a Nuclear Weapon. Ageless.

Grants player a Nuclear Weapon, and allows the player to build additional Nuclear Weapons via a Project. Unlocks the Operation Ivy Project if you have completed the Modern Military Legacy Path. Ageless.
World's Fair
Wins the Cultural Victory.
Wins the Cultural Victory.
+2[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold and[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production on Rural tiles with a Staatseisenbahn in your territory.
Golden Age University
Plague Hospital
+5[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food. +15% Growth Rate. Modern Food Building.
+15% Growth Rate. Modern Food Building.
